text: {{Infobox zone |name = Mahakali |native_name = महाकाली अञ्चल |settlement_type = Zone |motto = |image_skyline = |imagesize = 300px |image_caption = |image_map = Mahakali districts.png |mapsize = 300px |map_caption = |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = Nepal |subdivision_type1 = Region |subdivision_name1 = Far-Western Development Region |seat_type = Capital |seat = |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_title = |established_date = |area_footnotes = |area_total_km2 = |population_as_of = |population_footnotes = |population_note = |population_total = |population_density_km2 = |blank_name_sec1 = Main language(s) |blank_info_sec1 = |timezone = Nepal Time |utc_offset = +5:45 |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = |postal_code_type = |postal_code = |area_code = |website = |footnotes = }} Mahakali (), was a zone of Nepal in the Far-Western Development Region. It had an area of 6989 square kilometres. ==Related pages== *Zones of Nepal Category:Zones of Nepal
